resources.string: Congrats! You\'ve successfully set up your {device_name}!

Setup was successful, but you\'re not the primary owner so we can\'t check if the {device_name} connected to the Internet. If you see the WiFi icon with some bars this means it worked! If not, please restart the setup process.

Setup process failed at claiming your {device_name}, if your {device_name} display is showing a WiFi icon with a line through it, that means you provided wrong Wi-Fi credentials, please try setup process again.

Setup process couldn\'t disconnect from the {device_name} Wi-fi network. This is an internal problem with the device, so please try running setup again after resetting your {device_name} and putting it back in connection mode if needed.
Setup process couldn\'t configure the Wi-Fi credentials for your {device_name}, please try running setup again after resetting your {device_name} and putting it back in connection mode if needed.
Setup lost connection to the device before finalizing configuration process, please try running setup again after putting {device_name} back in connection mode.
